text: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
author: Pele

text: If you don't give education to people, it is easy to manipulate them.
author: Pele

text: Enthusiasm is everything. It must be taut and vibrating like a guitar string.
author: Pele

text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
author: Pele

text: Football is the only sport where you put people together, it doesn't matter if you are rich, or poor, or black, or white. It is one nation. This is the beauty of football.
author: Pele

text: A team is not made up of isolated individuals. Always stay in the game. Don't be passive. Football is a team game. No one plays alone. Success depends on your whole team being a single unit.
author: Pele

text: Great teams are not made up of many well-rounded players. Great teams are made up of a variety of players, each having their own strengths.
author: Pele

text: When you control the ball you control the score.
author: Pele

text: Brazil eats, sleeps and drinks football.
author: Pele

text: Brazil is crazy about football. People, they wait for this moment, but this doesn't mean we are going to win the championship. That is the problem.
author: Pele

text: No individual can win a game by himself.
author: Pele
